actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to expand the membership of the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations to include elected school board officials and elected town and township officials.

summary.text: Increases the membership of the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations by four members, to include elected school board officials and elected town and township officials.

titles.title: A bill to expand the membership of the Advisory Commission on Intergovernmental Relations to include elected school board officials and elected town and township officials.
